## IntRangeFormatOptions interface

Options to use when formatting in the [formatRange()](./nifty-tou.chronofieldformatter.formatrange.md) method.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IntRangeFormatOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [unboundedValue?](./nifty-tou.intrangeformatoptions.unboundedvalue.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The value to use for an "unbounded" value. The default value is <code>&quot;*&quot;</code>. |
